title: Oxfordshire Live: As it happened - BBC News
summary: a number of people have sustained injuries .

documents.title: oxford united 0-2 southend united
text: oxford united 0-2 southend united

documents.title: that 's all from us
text: thanks for joining us today .
we will be back at 08:00 tomorrow for more news , sport , weather and travel .

documents.title: nuclear archive opens in north scotland
text: a national archive for the civil nuclear industry has opened on the north coast of mainland scotland .
more than 70 years ' worth of information and up to 30 million digital records are to be stored at nucleus in wick , caithness .
they include papers , photographs and plans from nearby dounreay , as well as harwell in oxfordshire , trawsfynydd in snowdonia and sellafield in cumbria .
nucleus will also store local archives dating back to the 16th century .

documents.title: block of flats damaged in explosion and building collapse
text: a block of flats in osney mead has been damaged after an explosion in the osney lane and gibbs crescent area .
there were earlier reports of firemen helping free people from the flats .
six fire crews are currently in attendance at the scene , were an explosion was reported at 16:45 gmt .

documents.title: osney mead explosion : 'unknown if any are injured '
text: thames valley police has said it is unknown whether anyone is injured in an explosion in osney mead , west of oxford city centre .
previously oxfordshire fire and rescue service said there were `` several injuries '' .
eye witness amy glees said : `` i was outside the industrial units opposite .
`` trains carried on at first .
fire got very hot very quick . ''

documents.title: breakingseveral injured in osney mead explosion
text: several people have `` sustained injuries '' after a `` huge explosion '' in osney mead , west of oxford city centre .
thames valley police have told members of the public to avoid the area .
the incident took place at 16:45 in the osney lane and gibbs crescent area , police say a property has collapsed as a result of the explosion .
six fire crews are currently in attendence .

documents.title: stabbing victim dies in hospital
text: stabbing victim dies in hospital

documents.title: six fire crews in osney mead after 'huge explosion '
text: six fire crews are currently at osney mead in oxford after reports of a `` huge explosion '' .
passerby mark gray said : `` there 's a dozen police cars down there and about two ambulances . ''
breaking : large fire and explosion in the marina near osney lock # oxford more to come as we have it
video of it from across the railway - shook all the buildings .
horrific
hi amy , sounds really weird .
could we use your video for the bbc website ?
fine by me - yes weird and scary !
were you on a train at the time ?
has it stopped a train ?
i was outside the industrial units opposite so an 'earwitness ' .
trains carried on at first .
fire got v hot v quick

documents.title: breakingreports of big explosion in osney mead
text: residents and workers near osney lock have reported a `` huge explosion '' in the area .
amy glees , who was near the scene , said : `` [ it ] shook all the buildings '' .
big explosion and fire at the marina osney lock oxford .
hi tash , looks pretty serious .
any idea of what caused it ?
could i use your for the bbc website ?
yeah sure it was taken by @ twitterid but fine to use .
looks like a house and boats on fire

documents.title: which county council budget proposals do you love the most ?
text: it 's valentine 's day and love is in the air for oxfordshire county council .
as they decide this year 's budget , bethan phillips asks residents what proposals they love the most

documents.title: council bid for £ 3m for a40 improvements
text: council bid for £ 3m for a40 improvements

documents.title: debates continue on county council budget
text: as we said earlier , councillors are debating this year 's budget proposals today .
our political reporter bethan phillips is tweeting from the scene .
you can follow her updates here .
debate on the lib dem county council budget amendment fully underway - as viewed from the public gallery .

documents.title: injured man found on road in nuneham courtenay
text: police are looking into the reason why a man was in a road in nuneham courtenay with serious injuries just after midnight .
officers received a report of the 20-year-old man being on the a4074 .
he 's now being treated in hospital .

a spokesman said : `` the road had to be closed between the goldenballs and berinsfield roundabouts for several hours while officers investigated the scene to determine the circumstances which led to the man 's injuries . ''
it reopened at about 6:30 .
police are appealing for anyone who saw anything unusual to come forward .

documents.title: man arrested on sus of headington murder
text: a 27-year-old man who was arrested on sus of attempted murder yesterday , following the stabbing of a man in headington , has now been arrested on sus of murder and remains in police custody .
senior investigating officer det insp dave hubbard , from thames valley police 's major crime unit , said : `` i am aware that this will be a concerning incident for the local community .
`` we believe this to have been an isolated incident , and we are now in the process of conducting a thorough investigation .
`` members of the public may see an increased police presence in the area over the coming days whilst we conduct enquiries . ''

documents.title: breakingmurder investigation launched after headington stabbing
text: a murder investigation has been launched after a man was stabbed in oxford .
thames valley police was called at 15:00 yesterday to reports that a man in his 30s was stabbed on windmill road , headington .
he was taken to the john radcliffe hospital with life-threatening injuries where he later died .
his next of kin have been informed .

documents.title: oxford research finds listening to other cultures ' music 'improves attitudes '
text: listening to music from other cultures improves people 's attitudes to those cultures , oxford university researchers have said .
it follows experiments by music psychologists where listeners were played west african or indian pop music and then showed positive feelings towards the target culture .

professor eric clarke , of the music faculty at oxford university , said : `` music performs a whole range of psychological and social functions , bringing people together in powerful ways , and shaping people 's emotions and behaviours .
`` and it 's important to recognize that music can also be very divisive .
but at a time of increasing nationalism and isolationism , the findings of our study provide encouraging evidence for music 's capacity to increase cultural understanding . ''

documents.title: fog sensor for death pile-up motorway
text: fog sensor for death pile-up motorway

documents.title: council launches petition against oxfordshire 'devolution '
text: a petition has been launched by oxford city council against the county council 's proposal for a unitary authority .
the city council says the voice of oxford would be lost , and services could be at risk .
however , oxfordshire county council thinks the move would save money and simplify processes .
more than 600 people have signed the petition since it was set up .
author: Lucy Bickerton
BBC Radio Oxford

documents.title: christmas opening date for waitrose
text: supermarket chain waitrose is expecting to open the doors to its new store in banbury by christmas this year .
author: Banbury Guardian

documents.title: fog sensor to be installed on m40 for driver safety
text: a new fog sensor is to installed on the m40 near junction 9 , though it is not expected to happen until after april 2017 .
highways england said it would improve driver safety in the area .
it 's been two years since a fatal crash there in heavy fog involving more than 30 cars , in which a man died .

documents.title: appleton : 'southend clash more important than fa cup tie '
text: oxford united 's league one clash at home to southend tonight is significantly more important than their fa cup fifth tie on saturday according to boss michael appleton .
the u 's are currently four points outside the playoffs , with a game in hand on most above them , and would draw level on points with eighth placed southend with a victory this evening .
appleton told bbc radio oxford that points towards a promotion push mean more than their visit to premier league middlesborough at the weekend .
i do n't want to sound too controversial but it 's ten times more important to me .
people might not like that or disagree , or agree with it , but this is the most important game of the week for me .
author: Ross Heaton
BBC Oxford Sport

documents.title: county council to vote on tax rise
text: under plans being voted on today , households will have to pay nearly 5 % extra to oxfordshire county council in council tax .
it 's the biggest rise in 13 years .
council leader ian hudspeth said some of the money would go towards social care , including to those with learning disabilities .
it seems the meeting could go on for some time , so our political reporter is getting settled in .
i 'm in for a romantic # valentine 's evening - @ twitterid budget meeting expected to last until 7.30pm !
it 's starting now
i hope that there is copious amounts of tea and digestives !
good luck : - )

documents.title: more artists confirmed for nocturne
text: it has been announced that jamie cullum , corinne bailey rae , and gregory porter ( here with the grammy he won on sunday ) will play nocturne 2017 .
the event is a four-day concert series at blenheim palace , and the three artists have been confirmed for saturday 17 june .
already confirmed are the jacksonsandkool & the gang on the sunday , and composer max richter on the friday .

documents.title: oxfordshire 's restaurants with zero food hygiene ratings revealed
text: couples searching for the perfect candlelit dinner on valentine 's day have been urged to check the restaurant 's food hygiene score before booking .
author: Oxford Mail

documents.title: valentine 's ode to oxfordshire
text: this morning we 've been celebrating our love for this great county with 'ode to oxfordshire ' .
performance poet lucy ayrton composed the poem , taking on board listener feedback on the places to include , and this is the result .
author: Howard Bentham
Radio Oxford presenter

documents.title: new westgate opening date announced
text: it 's been announced the new westgate shopping centre in oxford will officially open on 24 october .
the £ 440m development will house more than 100 new stores including a john lewis department store , along with international brands such as calvin klein , joules and jo malone .
it 'll also include 25 restaurants , cafes and a roof garden .
developers say the opening will be in time for retailers to benefit from the christmas trading period .

documents.title: thames water 'facing biggest fine '
text: thames water will face its `` biggest ever fine '' after pumping millions of gallons of untreated sewage into the river thames , a judge has warned .
aylesbury crown court heard yesterday how the company breached pollution laws at sewage treatment works in didcot , aylesbury , henley , and little marlow , and a pumping station in littlemore .
but qc richard matthews said it was negligence rather than recklessness and that the company had improved , investing £ 4bn in upgrading equipment .
judge sheridan said the company should be punished and not the customers , in the form of higher bills .
thames water will be sentenced on 24 march .
author: Jeremy Stern
BBC South Today

documents.title: weather : 'cloudy with light winds '
text: weather : 'cloudy with light winds '
author: Bee Tucker
BBC Weather

documents.title: travel update : accident blocks milton road westbound
text: milton road westbound is blocked due to an accident after sutton courtenay road .
a car has gone into a tree and emergency vehicles are at the scene .
the swinford toll bridge is very slow on all approaches from eynsham , with a travel time of up to 10 minutes .
and do n't forget , the a415 is closed all week in both directions for telecoms between the rose revived pub and standlake .
a diversion is in place via the a420 .
author: Al Ryan
BBC Oxford travel presenter

documents.title: council bid for £ 3m for a40 improvements
text: construction on a new bus lane and park and ride west of oxford could begin in september 2018 , according to the council .
oxfordshire county council said it hoped to complete the design of the 1,000-space park and ride and transport route by next year .
the authority has said it needs to invest £ 3m to develop the project , which would be recouped from the department for transport .
the project would cost more than £ 50m .
author: Alex Regan
BBC South

documents.title: good morning
text: happy valentine 's day to you from all the team at bbc local live for oxfordshire .
we 'll be bringing you all the news from across the county as it breaks today .
thanks to anthony morris for our main image , which he 's dedicated to `` all the lovers of the world '' .
he said he saw these swans `` shape up together to form a love heart , at rspb otmoor '' .
and if that does n't get you in the valentine 's mood , we 're pretty sure nothing will !
